titles.title: HP481 The heavens declare thy glory, Lord

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The heavens declare thy glory, Lord,
In every star thy wisdom shines;
But when our eyes behold thy word,
We read thy name in fairer lines.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The rolling sun, the changing light,
And night and day, thy power confess;
But the blest volume thou hast writ
Reveals thy justice and thy grace.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sun, moon, and stars convey thy praise
Round this whole earth, and never stand;
So when thy truth began its race,
It touched and glanced on every land.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nor shall thy spreading gospel rest
Till through the world thy truth has run;
Till Christ has all the nations blest,
That see the light or feel the sun.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Great Sun of Righteousness, arise,
Bless our dark world with heavenly light:
Thy gospel makes the simple wise;
Thy laws are pure, thy judgements right.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Thy noblest wonders here we view,
In souls renewed, and sins forgiven;
Lord, cleanse my sins, my soul renew,
And make thy word my guide to heaven.
